name: Orphan and the Lost Mother: Demo
name_original: Orphan and the Lost Mother: Demo
description:
✦A dark fantasy, horror visual novel✦

✦Would she be able to live her life the way she had always loved with her Mother in it?

✦ "Orphan and the Lost Mother" is a demo made for NaNoRenO2022.  Follow us on itch.io or Twitter for announcements on the full release!  ✦

Follow Studio Orangelly on Twitter

⚠︎WARNING: This game is not suitable for young children or those easily disturbed.  There are non-graphic themes of violence and abuse.⚠︎

 The Academy was a sprawling labyrinth, especially for a young girl.  It housed children who needed a particularly special education, and of course, those who needed a special family.  One day, an orphan receives a letter that she will be reunited with her Mother.

✦Would she be able to live her life the way she had always loved with her Mother in it?

 ✦Would she have to leave behind everyone she grew to love, and live life with someone she had never met?

✦Who can she trust?

✦Demo

✦Kinetic visual novel 

✦6k words 

✦Estimated gameplay time: 25-40 minutes

 ✦Custom soundtrack

Studio Orangelly

✦Director, Writing, Programming - Jarrm

✦Art, Programming : Yango

✦Art: N2Existance
